name: Kloris
content:
Kloris was a human male who was a driver for Senator Mon Mothma on Coruscant in 5 BBY.
He accompanied Mothma when she visited Luthen Rael's Galactic Antiquities and Objects of Interest where she claimed she was buying a present for her husband, Perrin Fertha, for his Day of Days, though she really wanted to talk to Rael about their rebel activities. Suspecting that Kloris was an Imperial spy sent to watch Mothma, Rael's associate Kleya Marki distracted Kloris by showing him some of the items in the gallery.
The next night, Kloris drove Mothma and Fertha in a speeder to an event when Fertha, after asking his wife for Kloris' name for the second time that day, asked Kloris to take the Expressway.
